data.actual_result: A white bar appear for a split second on the bottom of the page
data.expected_result: No white bar at the bottom
data.short_description: [Web bug] The invite screen has a strange white bar
data.steps_to_repro: - Open https://discordapp(dot)com/invite/invitelink - Make it so the invite is in the second page in safari - Click in the bottom left to open all open tabs - Open the invite tab again and watch - If that fails, try moving your phone into landscape mode and back to vertical
